mapper.sql: id, username, password, mobile, status, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_user (username, password, mobile, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{mobile}, #{status}, now(), now())
mapper.select: SELECT su.id, su.username, su.password, su.mobile, su.status, su.create_time, su.update_time, sr.id sr_id, sr.name sr_name, sr.status sr_status, sr.create_time sr_create_time, sr.update_time sr_update_time FROM sys_user su INNER JOIN sys_user_role sur on su.id = sur.user_id INNER JOIN sys_role sr on sur.role_id = sr.id WHERE su.id = #{id} and su.status = 1
SELECT FROM sys_user WHERE username = #{username} and status = 1
SELECT FROM sys_user WHERE mobile = #{mobile} and status = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_user SET status = #{status}, update_time = now() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE sys_user SET username = #{username}, password = #{password}, mobile = #{mobile}, update_time = now() WHERE id = #{id}
